name: Surfenstein
description:
controls

Space - Jump

W / O (In Midair) - Spin

P + Q - Handstand

G + V - Lie Down

C - Flip

chris maire presents: surfenstein

in this sequel to Mary Shelley's classic work of gothic horror, Frankenstein, join Victor Frankenstein's monster on his lonely journey to the frozen northern reaches of the globe in his quest for atonement

music by Christopher Curry John O'Connell ,  http://theratproblem.tumblr.com/

download : windows .exe

made for the public domain jam

feedback?
